description: This source file defines a custom React hook `useWeather` which manages weather data fetching based on user location or city suggestions. It handles initial geolocation, city suggestions with debounce, and fetching current and forecast data from weather APIs. It also maintains state for location, weather data, loading status, errors, and suggestions.

methods.name: useWeather()
methods.description: Main hook that manages weather state, geolocation, city suggestions, and API integrations.

methods.name: getBrowserGeolocation(timeout = 5000)
methods.description: Utility function to get the user's geolocation with a specified timeout.
